articles.title: Pant's heroics reminded me of Stokes: Langer - cricket.com.au
articles.description: One and a half years after England's Ben Stokes shocked Australia in an epic run chase, Rishabh Pant produced a similar knock to snatch victory in Brisbane.
articles.content:
Rishabh Pant's match-winning rampage triggered an unpleasant sense of deja vu for Australia coach Justin Langer, taking him back to Ben Stokes' masterful chase in 2019.
